creditline: Gift of funds from Marla J. Kinney
description: winter landscape; darkened sky with billowing clouds moving upwards; small house with orange light coming out of three windows; tree in front of house; group of dark shadowed trees in C; snow covered hill with fence on sloping hill on R
provenance: [Hilary Chapman Fine Prints, Richmond, Surrey, England, until 1997; sold to Rossetti]; John Rossetti, Somerville, Mass. (1997–2021); [William P. Carl, Durham, N.C., 2021]
signed: LRC, in etched print: SG. BOXSIUS
title: Winter
